mehenDi: Differential testing on the forest of trees output form TreeTerminus

Source: R/mehenDi-package.R
mehenDi-package.Rd

This package provides a tree based differential testing for RNA-Seq data, where the tree is obtained from TreeTerminus. The candidate nodes can consist of both leaves and inner nodes, with inner nodes comprising a susbet of transcripts that exhibit high uncertainty.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/NPSDC/mehenDi
